name: Extracurricular Programs
description: School partners with several afterschool program providers. This will vary from year to year based on interest level. Past programs included: - Soccer Shots for Preschool - Art Classes - Chess Classes - Engineering for Kids - Coding - Children's Choir
fullDescription: School partners with several afterschool program providers. This will vary from year to year based on interest level. Past programs included: - Soccer Shots for Preschool - Art Classes - Chess Classes - Engineering for Kids - Coding - Children's Choir
whatTheyOffer: School partners with several afterschool program providers. This will vary from year to year based on interest level. Past programs included: - Soccer Shots for Preschool - Art Classes - Chess Classes - Engineering for Kids - Coding - Children's Choir
howToGetIt: - Tours are required - schedule reservation. - If you have any questions, please submit an inquiry form or call at 415-587-7256. - To apply use online form.
cost: This is a fee based service
